intent_atoms.description: Refactor the app shell and parse tree experience so that the three-column NavigationSplitView matches the clean NavigationSplitViewKit demo layout, removing overlaid frames under the toolbar and ensuring a single split view with stable column order.
Single top-level NavigationSplitView owns sidebar/content/inspector (no nested split views inside the content column).
Columns are flush beneath the toolbar with no extra framing or vertical inset; match NavigationSplitViewKit demo proportions.
Box Tree (content column) cannot be hidden by inspector toggles; inspector visibility only affects the inspector column.
Selecting a box always switches inspector to Selection Details; integrity view does not stick after selection.
Toggle controls swap inspector content (details vs integrity) without altering column visibility or pushing other columns.
Keyboard shortcuts (⌘⌥I and focus shortcuts) still function with the flattened layout.
macOS/iPad/iPhone adaptive behaviors remain stable (balanced style).
The app must always use a single top-level NavigationSplitView; nested split views inside content column are prohibited.
Per-column padding that causes visual insets must be minimized or applied only within the view content.
Keep the single NavigationSplitView at the AppShell level and ensure content is plain VStack ..

functional_units.name: NavigationSplitView Layout Refactor
functional_units.description: Replaces nested split views with a single top-level NavigationSplitView that owns sidebar, content, and inspector columns.

functional_units.name: Sidebar Column
functional_units.description: Provides navigation or selection controls for the app shell.

functional_units.name: Content Column (Box Tree)
functional_units.description: Displays the box tree view; remains visible regardless of inspector toggles.

functional_units.name: Inspector Column
functional_units.description: Shows either Selection Details or Integrity Summary based on toggle state, without affecting column visibility.

functional_units.name: Inspector Detail View
functional_units.description: Container for the inspector content, exclusive to details/integrity views.

functional_units.name: Toggle Controls for Inspector Content
functional_units.description: Switches between Selection Details and Integrity view within the inspector column.

functional_units.name: Keyboard Shortcut Handling (⌘⌥I, focus shortcuts)
functional_units.description: Maintains shortcut functionality in the flattened layout.

functional_units.name: Adaptive Layout Behavior
functional_units.description: Ensures balanced style on macOS/iPad/iPhone with stable preview updates.
